verses.content: Aw, LALPA kuomah lâwmthu hril unla, a hming lam ro; Mi tin lai chun a thilthaw chu inhriettir ro.
Ama chawimawiin hla sak unla, ama inpâkin sak ro; A thilmak thaw po po thu chu titi ro.
A hming inthieng chu sawng ro, LALPA zawngtuhai lungril chu hlim raw se.
LALPA le a hrâtna chu zawng unla, A hmêl chu zawng rawp ro.
A thilmak thawhai chu hre zing ro, A thilmakhai le a baua a rorêl suokhai chu:
Aw, a siehlaw Abraham thlahai, Jakob thla, a ithlanghai.
Ama chu LALPA ei Pathien chu a nih, A rorêlhai chu hnuoi chung po poa hin a um.
A thuthlung chu kumkhuoin a hriet hlak a, Suon sâng khat chena a thu lo pêk chu;
Abraham kuoma a thuthlung le, Isak kuoma a înkhâmna chu.
Chu ma chu thuruot ni dingin Jakob kuomah a sukdet a, Israel kuoma kumkhawtluong thuthlung dingin;
“Kanaan ram hi i kuomah pêng ka ti che, I rochan puol ding chu,” tiin;
Mi tlâwmte chau, an ni lai khan, Anih, tlâwmte chau chu rama chun mikhuol an ni nâwk nghâl sih a.
Hnam tum tum kuomah an fe lawn an fe lawn a, Ram tum tuma inthawkin mi tum tumhai kuomah.
Tu inêksâwr khawm a phal nawh a, Anih, anni leiin lalhai khawm a kâwk a,
“Ka hriek nâlhai chu tâwk naw unla, Ka zâwlneihai pawi hrim hrim khawm tâwk naw ro,” tiin.
Chu rama tla dingin ṭâm a ko a, Fâk ding hrim hrim ân um nawtir tah a.
An hmaah mi a tir a, Josef chu siehlaw dinga zawrin a um a,
A kehai chu kawlin an suk- na a, Thîr khaidiet bunin a um tah a.
A thu a tlung hmakhat chun, LALPA thu chun ama chu a fie hlak a.
Laltak chun mi a tir a, a sût a, Ân suo tah a, mi tin rorêltu ngei chun.
A sûnghai chungah hotua le, A sum po po chunga rorêltuah a siem a;
A mi lienhai chu a nuom nuoma a khuop ding le, A upahai sukvar dingin.
Israel khawm chu Aigupta ramah a feh a, Jakob ruok chu Ham rama chun a um ta hrih a.
A mihai chu nasatakin a sukpung a, Anni dotuhai nêkin a sukhrât ta lem a.
A mihai theida dingin an lungril ân lêttir a, A siehlawhai chunga vervêktaka thaw dingin.
A siehlaw Mosie chu a tir a, A mi thlang Aron leh.
Anni chun ân chiknahai chu anni lai an inentir a, Ham rama chun thilmakhai an inentir a.
Ama chun inthim a tir a, a sukthim tah a, Chuongchun, a thuhai chu an sêl ta nawh a.
An tuihai chu thisena ân changtir a, An ngahai chu a sukhlum tah a.
An ram chu uin a sip tah a, An lalhai pindana chen khawm.
Ama chun thu a hril a; chuongchun, tho tamtak an hung a, Hrik khawm an ram sûng po poah an hung bawk a.
An kuomah ruo aiah riel a pêk a, An rama chun mei chawk zawr zawr a pêk ta bawk a.
An grêp hruihai le an theichang kûnghai a sukhlum a, An rama thinghai chu a sukthliek ta bawk a.
Ama chun thu a hril a; chuong- chun, khâuhai an hung a, Tuktulunghai leh, tiem seng ruollo tawp el hin.
Chuonghai chun an rama thlai tinrênghai chu an fâk zo a, An hnuoi rahai khawm an fâk zo ta bawk a.
An rama nau lutîr um po po a sukhlum a, An hrâtna po po ra hmasatakhai chu.
Chuongchun, tangka le râng- kachak leh a ṭhuoi suok a, Ama hnamhai laia chun mi hrât naw pakhat khawm an um dêr nawh.
An suok lai chun Aiguptahai chu an lâwm a, Anni chu an hung ṭî ta leiin.
Ama chun hlietu dingin sûm ân zâmtir a, Zâna êntu dingin mei a pêk bawk a.
An hnih a; chuongchun, vamîm a hung ṭhuoi a, Vân buin anni chu a sukkhawp tah a.
Lungpui chu a hawng a; chuongchun, tui a hung suok zur zur a, Hmun ṭâwlahai chun vadung ang el hin a luong tah a.
A thu inthieng kha a hriet zing sih a: A siehlaw Abraham le khan.
Chuongchun, a mihai chu hlimtakin a ṭhuoi suok tah a, A mi thlanghai chu hla sak pei pumin.
Chun,hnam tin ramhai chu an kuomah a pêkpêk a, Anni chun mi tin thaw suoksa chu an hluo tah a;
A thuruothai chu an zâwm thei a, A dânhai chu an vawngṭhat theina dingin. LALPA chu inpâk ro.
